name: PLORBO: Creature Procurement
description:
Status: WIP

ATTENTION, PLORBO! Our zoo attendance is down drastically. We require new creatures from across the Universe - are you up for a bit of exploration? We will beam our preferences to your Mothership and scan any creatures that you present. Please help us, Plorbo... you're our only hope. 

Controls
  • Arrow keys to move
    • DOWN to undock from Mothership
  • Z to boost (Careful! Uses a lot of energy!)
  • X to abduct
  • UP/Z/X when docked to offer an abducted creature to the Mothership
  • ENTER to reset cart
  • When out of energy, Left/Right to control Mothership
Gameplay
  • Mothership requires specific creatures
    • View head/body hologram requirements at the Mothership and then explore the planet surface to find a creature with the correct head and body
    • Collect 3 correct creatures to visit the next planet
  • Don't run out of energy (yellow bar above your green ship)!
    • Refuel when docked at Mothership
    • Boosting, abducting, moving, and hovering uses different amounts of energy
  • If you do run out of energy, control your Mothership to rescue yourself & recharge
  • Use your radar at top of screen to view your location in relation to the Mothership
Procedurally Generated Planets
  • The planet name, background color, heavenly bodies, blue hills, and foreground will all be procedurally generated for each planet you visit. Collect 3 of the correct creatures (or reset the cart) to visit a new planet.
